synopsis.text: Nebula Weapons, superheroes, and a forgotten past collide in the life of high school student Soya Kuroi, who lives with a cat-like creature called Sensei and a cheerful green-haired maiden named Ginko. Plagued by dreams of dragons and superpowered warriors, Soya's only memory of his past is a vivid nightmare of destruction. When his city is attacked by a massive, teddy bear-shaped UFO, seven rainbow-sparkling heroes emerge to defend it. However, Soya's life takes an unexpected turn as he is thrust into a conflict against these protectors, with his true motive for fighting hidden deep within his lost memories. Based on a concept by manga creator Satoshi Mizukami, this original mecha anime and manga project promises a thrilling and mysterious adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
